name: jen's half hour hat
notes:
the perfect hat to knit for yourself or for someone you care about! this is my personal favorite hat – i have knit several of them for myself and for others, and it’s my go-to daily winter extra cozy hat. (the shape and fit are just right!) knit this hat in a half hour using 100 grams of bulky yarn. (you can knit two hats from one 200 gram skein!) it’s easy to modify by adding or subtracting rows in the ribbed or stockinette section. lickity split, quick little knit. happy knitting! please share your hats online by using the hashtag #jenshalfhourhat – i love seeing your projects!

if you'd like to knit along with me (or see the optional join), here's a video! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bnfy09khvgi

sizes
one size: adult
to fit 18-20” / 45.72-50.8 cm head size

finished measurements
18-20” / 45.72-50.8 cm circumference (hat is stretchy)
9” / 23 cm tall

yarn
wool and the gang crazy sexy wool
or the wool from we are knitters
100% wool
80m/87 yards = 200 gr super bulky | 4 wpi

needles
us 15 / 10 mm 16” circular needle (or size needed to obtain gauge)
us 15 / 10 mm dpns

notions
large sitch marker
tapestry needle

gauge
5 sts and 6 rnds/rows = 2 in / 5 cm in stockinette stitch on us 15 / 10 mm needles
(use smaller needles for a smaller hat)
